name: Bounk
description:
Bounk was made for the GMTK Jam 2018. 

Bounk (pronounced like 'bounce' but with a "K")  is a game about the challenges of controlling a magical ping pong ball that cannot stop bouncing. The game was designed to be a reduction of the  2D platformer genre. In Bounk you cannot run or make extended contact with the ground, instead you must use gravity manipulation to get the ball to where you want it to go.  The game is played entirely with the mouse.

Controls:

Mouse Cursor = Move

Mouse Buttons = Change Orientation

Middle Mouse Button = View Whole Level

F11 = Fullscreen

To exit the game, click and hold on the ball, it will also slow down time, could be useful.
